hero.title: Finding the Perfect Modern Home to Rent House in Sector 77 Gurgaon
description: Sector 77 stands out as one of New Gurgaon’s most desirable residential neighborhoods offering a premium lifestyle and unparalleled connectivity. If you are searching to Rent House in Sector 77 Gurgaon, you are looking at modern high-rise apartments, spacious builder floors, and luxury penthouses designed for contemporary living. This sector provides seamless access to the Southern Peripheral Road SPR, NH-48, and major corporate hubs like Cyber City and Golf Course Extension Road.

We provide expertly curated listings of verified rental properties across Sector 77. Our portfolio includes fully furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished units catering to various budgets and family sizes. Start your search today and secure a high-quality residential rental property that meets all your needs for comfort, security, and convenience right here in Sector 77 Gurgaon.

featuresSection.heading: Diverse Rental Housing Options and Property Types Available in Sector 77 Gurgaon
description: Sector 77 Gurgaon offers a highly dynamic rental market featuring properties from top-tier developers. Whether you are a nuclear family seeking a spacious 3 BHK or a young professional needing an efficient studio apartment, the choices here are abundant and varied. Understanding the specific types of homes available is the first step toward finding your ideal rental house.

Our platform simplifies the process of finding the right unit size and configuration ensuring that your move to Sector 77 is smooth and stress-free. Review the popular residential rental configurations available and discover the excellent amenities associated with each property type.

features.title: 1 BHK and Studio Apartments
features.description: These compact and highly efficient units are perfect for bachelors, young couples, or working professionals prioritizing location and affordability. Sector 77 apartments are typically located within gated complexes offering excellent security, dedicated parking, and essential amenities like power backup. Renting a 1 BHK in this area gives you modern convenience without the high cost of larger units.

features.title: 2 BHK Residential Flats
features.description: A very popular choice for small families or individuals who require a dedicated home office space. 2 BHK rental houses in Sector 77 often come with two bathrooms and balconies providing ample natural light and ventilation. These units strike a perfect balance between space and budget offering access to community facilities like swimming pools and gyms within the complex.

features.title: 3 BHK Luxury Homes
features.description: Designed for mid to large-sized families, 3 BHK properties are the mainstay of luxury rentals in Sector 77. These homes feature expansive living areas, servant quarters in many premium projects, and high-end finishes. Renting a 3 BHK allows residents to enjoy the full suite of amenities provided by world-class developers known for their quality construction and maintenance standards.

features.title: 4 BHK Large Apartments
features.description: For those seeking maximum space and opulence, 4 BHK rental houses provide multiple bedrooms, formal dining spaces, and large kitchens. These units are often situated on higher floors offering stunning views of the city skyline and Aravalli hills. This configuration is ideal for multi-generational families or expatriates seeking a very spacious, comfortable, and prestigious rental residence.

features.title: Independent Builder Floors
features.description: Offering greater privacy and independence compared to high-rise living, builder floors are an excellent alternative in Sector 77. Residents enjoy exclusive access to an entire floor, often with dedicated parking and terrace space. This choice is appealing to tenants who prefer a quieter neighborhood feel while retaining access to the excellent infrastructure of the area.

features.title: Serviced Rental Residences
features.description: For short-term or hassle-free long-term stays, serviced apartments provide fully maintained and furnished living environments. These rentals include housekeeping, utility management, and often meal services. They are highly favored by corporate clients and transferees needing immediate, premium accommodation without the complexities of setting up a traditional rental agreement.

Below are some crucial location benefits that make Sector 77 a top rental choice in Gurgaon.

points.title: Future Growth Potential of the Area

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Renting a House in Sector 77 Gurgaon
faqSection.description: Get quick answers to the most common queries regarding lease terms, deposits, maintenance, and utility charges when searching to rent house in Sector 77.

faqs.question: What is the typical lock-in period for a rental agreement in Sector 77
faqs.answer: Rental agreements in Sector 77 Gurgaon usually follow a standard structure of an 11-month lease which is renewable. Most landlords enforce a mandatory lock-in period of 6 months. During this lock-in period, the tenant cannot vacate the property without incurring a penalty, usually the forfeiture of the security deposit or one month's rent. Always confirm the specific lock-in clause before signing your agreement to rent house in Sector 77.

faqs.question: How much security deposit is generally required for rentals here
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit across high-rise apartments and builder floors in Sector 77 is equivalent to two months of the agreed-upon rent. This deposit is refundable upon the termination of the lease, provided there is no damage to the property beyond standard wear and tear and all dues are cleared. For very high-end or fully furnished properties, the deposit may occasionally extend to three months rent.

faqs.question: Are maintenance charges included in the monthly rent in Sector 77 complexes
faqs.answer: Typically, the monthly rent quoted by the landlord does not include the society maintenance charges. These charges cover common area upkeep, security, power backup for common facilities, and garbage collection. The maintenance fee is usually paid separately by the tenant directly to the RWA or facility management team. Always clarify who is responsible for paying these charges before finalizing the deal.

faqs.question: Is Sector 77 a safe area for families and single female tenants
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 77 is considered a very safe and secure residential location. The vast majority of rental properties are located within modern, gated societies equipped with high-tech security features, boom barriers, and round-the-clock security personnel. The area has a robust civic infrastructure and remains well-lit and populated, enhancing overall safety, especially within the confines of residential towers.

faqs.question: What is the typical duration for finding a good rental house in Sector 77 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: The time required to secure a rental house in Sector 77 varies depending on your requirements and the time of year. Generally, with professional assistance, the process from initial search to signing the lease takes about 7 to 14 days. The market moves quickly, especially for popular 2 BHK and 3 BHK units, so being prepared with documentation is crucial for a fast closure.

faqs.question: Are pets generally allowed in residential apartments in Sector 77
faqs.answer: Pet policies vary significantly across different housing societies and even between individual landlords in Sector 77. While many complexes are pet-friendly, some RWA rules restrict certain sizes or breeds, and some landlords impose strict no-pet clauses. It is essential to communicate your need for a pet-friendly rental property clearly at the start of your search to avoid complications later.

faqs.question: Who is responsible for minor repairs and wear and tear during the tenancy
faqs.answer: Standard practice dictates that the tenant is responsible for minor repairs such as light bulb replacements, minor plumbing fixes, and general upkeep that falls under 'day-to-day maintenance'. Major structural repairs, issues with external painting, or system failures like geysers or air conditioners that are part of the original fit-out are typically the landlord's responsibility. Lease agreements clearly detail this division.

faqs.question: What are the common utility charges a tenant must pay separately
faqs.answer: As a tenant in Sector 77, you will typically be responsible for monthly consumption charges for electricity, water if not included in maintenance, piped natural gas PNG if applicable, and internet/DTH services. Tenants usually need to transfer the electricity meter account into their name or pay based on meter readings provided by the landlord or society.

faqs.question: Can I negotiate the monthly rent price in Sector 77
faqs.answer: Yes, rental prices are negotiable, although the margin for negotiation often depends on current market demand, the length of the lease you are offering, and whether the property is fully furnished or unfurnished. We leverage our market expertise to secure the best possible monthly rent on your behalf, especially if you commit to a longer tenure than the standard 11 months.

faqs.question: What documentation is needed to finalize a rental agreement here
faqs.answer: To finalize the lease and rent house in Sector 77, you will typically need copies of Aadhar Card, PAN Card, proof of employment or business registration, recent salary slips or bank statements, and passport-sized photographs. Foreign nationals require a valid visa, passport, and proof of local employment or study. Our team assists in compiling and verifying all necessary documents.
